about_the_game:
Developed in cooperation with snipers from Russian Elite Special Forces, the semi-auto SV-AMUR Sniper Rifle is intended for precise target engagement at ranges of up to 1000 meters, with the ability to fire Darpa, AP and EMP bullets. A small stock of these rifles was confiscated by Siberian Wolves and are now available on the black market - get em' while they last!

Features:

  • SV-AMUR Sniper Rifle

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains Blood, Intense Violence and Strong Language.
